price: Zakariyyā berkata, "Ya Tuhan-ku, berilah aku suatu tanda".  Tuhan berfirman, "Tanda bagimu ialah bahwa kamu tidak dapat bercakap-cakap dengan manusia selama tiga malam, padahal kamu sehat".
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱجۡعَل لِّيٓ ءَايَةٗۖ قَالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ ٱلنَّاسَ ثَلَٰثَ لَيَالٖ سَوِيّٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi ij'ʿal lī āyatan qāla āyatuka allā tukallima al-nāsa thalātha layālin sawiyyan
